text: Rocky Hollow was a 1983 stop motion animation children's television series made in Wales and produced by Rockscene Ltd. The show was narrated by Peter Sallis, who later became the voice of Ratty in The Wind in the Willows and the voice of Wallace in Wallace & Gromit. This was the first children's television show to be produced by Bumper Films for S4C. These were in production with S4C, Mike Young Productions and Prism Art and Design Ltd. ==References== Category:1983 American television series debuts Category:American children's television series Category:1980s American animated television series
title: Rocky Hollow
